FG_NHG_TEST.desc: Fine-grained ECMP next-hop group configuration in FG_NHG_LIST table.

FG_NHG_PREFIX_TEST.desc: Fine-grained ECMP prefix configuration in FG_NHG_PREFIX_LIST table.

FG_NHG_MEMBER_TEST.desc: Fine-grained ECMP next-hop member configuration in FG_NHG_MEMBER_LIST table.

FG_NHG_MEMBER_MULTI_LINK_TEST.desc: Fine-grained ECMP next-hop member configuration with multiple links in FG_NHG_MEMBER_LIST table.

FG_NHG_TEST_DUPLICATE_NAME.desc: Fine-grained ECMP next-hop group configuration with duplicate name in FG_NHG_LIST table.

FG_NHG_MEMBER_TEST_INVALID_IP.desc: Fine-grained ECMP next-hop member configuration with invalid IP value in FG_NHG_MEMBER_LIST table.

FG_NHG_PREFIX_TEST_INVALID_PREFIX.desc: Fine-grained ECMP prefix configuration with invalid prefix value in FG_NHG_PREFIX_LIST table.

FG_NHG_MEMBER_TEST_INVALID_LINK.desc: Fine-grained ECMP next-hop member configuration with invalid link value in FG_NHG_MEMBER_LIST table.

FG_NHG_MEMBER_TEST_MISSING_FG_NHG_REF.desc: Fine-grained ECMP next-hop member configuration with missing FG_NHG reference in FG_NHG_MEMBER_LIST table.

FG_NHG_PREFIX_TEST_MISSING_FG_NHG_REF.desc: Fine-grained ECMP prefix configuration with missing FG_NHG reference in FG_NHG_PREFIX_LIST table.

FG_NHG_MEMBER_TEST_MISSING_BANK.desc: Fine-grained ECMP next-hop member configuration with missing bank in FG_NHG_MEMBER_LIST table.

FG_NHG_PREFIX_TEST_DUPLICATE_ENTRY.desc: Fine-grained ECMP prefix configuration with duplicate entry in FG_NHG_PREFIX_LIST table.

FG_NHG_MEMBER_TEST_DUPLICATE_MEMBER.desc: Fine-grained ECMP next-hop member configuration with duplicate member in FG_NHG_MEMBER_LIST table.

FG_NHG_PREFIX_BASED_MISSING_MAX_NEXT_HOP.desc: Fine-grained ECMP prefix-based match-mode configuration with missing max_next_hops in FG_NHG_LIST table.

FG_NHG_PREFIX_BASED_INVALID_MAX_NEXT_HOP.desc: Fine-grained ECMP prefix-based match-mode configuration with out-of-range max_next_hops value in FG_NHG_LIST table.

FG_NHG_PREFIX_BASED_MISSING_BUCKET_SIZE.desc: Fine-grained ECMP prefix-based match-mode configuration with missing bucket_size in FG_NHG_LIST table.
